mapper.insert: insert into member(no, id, pw, pwLoop, salt, email, activationKey, regDate, power, expiredate) values( member_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{pw}, #{pwLoop}, #{salt}, #{email}, #{activationKey}, sysdate, 0, sysdate )
mapper.select: select * from member order by id asc
select * from member order by regDate asc
select * from member order by power desc
mapper.update: update member set power=1 where activationKey=#{activationKey}
update member set expiredate=sysdate+#{day} where id=#{uid}
update member set expiredate=expiredate+#{day} where id=#{uid}
update member set downcount=downcount+#{downcount} where id=#{uid}
update member set downcount=downcount-1 where id=#{uid}
